Las_Cruces.Burrell College of Osteopathic Medicine: The Burrell College of Osteopathic Medicine at New Mexico State University is a private, osteopathic medical school located in Las Cruces, New Mexico. Founded in 2013, the school is located on the campus of New Mexico State University. The medical school holds pre-accreditation from the American Osteopathic Association's Commission on Osteopathic College Accreditation.
